title: Drawing, "Sketch for "The Wreck", an oil painting dated 1896 at the Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA", 1881
creditline: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
description:
Horizontal view showing a group of figures; at center is a man with his right arm upraised; at left are two figures; and to the right is a faintly indicated rough sea and 
a man launching a lifeboat.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sketch for "The Wreck", an oil painting dated 1896 at the Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA", 1881.
1881. Charcoal on paper. Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.. 1912-12-212.
